text:
GENERAL ASSEMBLY
(20 to 23 November 1968)
1. MINUTES
Confirmation of minutes of Closing Plenary Session of Fourth General Assembly
2. ADMINISTRATIVE COUNCIL
Election of ABU members to the Administrative Council in terms of
Article 7, Clause 3> of the ABU Statutes
3. VICE-PRESIDENT
Election of one Vice-President in terms of Article 8 of the ABU Statutes
4. MEMBERSHIP
Consideration of applications for membership
5. AGENDA
Approval, if necessary, of the inclusion of items in the agenda under
Article 10, Clauses 2 and 3> of the Statutes
6. WORKING PROCEDURE OF THE FIFTH GENERAL ASSEMBLY
7. COMMITTEES
(a) Report of the Programme Committee
(b) Report of the Engineering Committee
(c) Appointment of Chairmen of Committees
8. SUBMISSIONS FROM THE ADMINISTRATIVE COUNCIL
(a) Review of Progress on decisions of Fourth General Assembly and
decisions of the Administrative Council:
(i) The Ford Foundation
(ii) Staff Training Projects:
(i) Broadcasting Training Institute
(ii) Training Courses arranged by Members
(iii) Australian Commercial Broadcasting Fellowship
(iv) The Thomson Foundation
(iii) Affiliation with UNESCO
(iv) Assistance to Members making Applications for Aid
(v) ABU Handbook
